com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPListView

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.ListView
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPListView

public class WPListView
extends android.widget.ListView

An extension to the standard AOSP ListView designed to shrink children when pressed as well as overscroll.

Since:
16-12-2012

Field Summary
static float SCALE_DAMPER
          A value from 0 - 1 used to damper the rate at which the View children are scaled.
